section.title: Hardened
section.para: A profile with most (vanilla) hardening options enabled by default, potentially at the cost of features and performance.

This includes a hardened kernel, and limiting the system information available to processes through the /sys and /proc filesystems. It also disables the User Namespaces feature of the kernel for non-root users, which means you need to be root to build anything. See the
profile source for further detail on which settings are altered.
